name: An Occasional Dream
description: When a young and upcoming game designer has the bright idea to create a JRPG of his very own, he suddenly finds himself in the JRPG that he set out to create! Though he soon realises that things aren't quite as straight-forward as they seem...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel 1.6 GHZ or AMD 1.9 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
